verses.text: \w Cry|strong="H7121"\w* \w aloud|strong="H1627"\w*, \w spare|strong="H2820"\w* not, \w lift|strong="H7311"\w* up thy \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* like a \w trumpet|strong="H7782"\w*, and \w shew|strong="H5046"\w* my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* their \w transgression|strong="H6588"\w*, and the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* their \w sins|strong="H2403"\w*.\f + \fr 58.1 \ft aloud: Heb. with the throat\f*

Yet they \w seek|strong="H1875"\w* me \w daily|strong="H3117"\w*, and \w delight|strong="H2654"\w* to \w know|strong="H1847"\w* my \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, as a \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* that \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w*, and \w forsook|strong="H5800"\w* not the \w ordinance|strong="H4941"\w* of their \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: they \w ask|strong="H7592"\w* of me the \w ordinances|strong="H4941"\w* of \w justice|strong="H6664"\w*; they take \w delight|strong="H2654"\w* in \w approaching|strong="H7132"\w* to \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

¶ Wherefore have we \w fasted|strong="H6684"\w*, \add say they\add*, and thou \w seest|strong="H7200"\w* not? \add wherefore\add* have we \w afflicted|strong="H6031"\w* our \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*, and thou takest no \w knowledge|strong="H3045"\w*? Behold, in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of your \w fast|strong="H6685"\w* ye \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \w pleasure|strong="H2656"\w*, and \w exact|strong="H5065"\w* all your \w labours|strong="H6092"\w*.\f + \fr 58.3 \ft labours: or, things wherewith ye grieve others: Heb. griefs\f*

Behold, ye \w fast|strong="H6684"\w* for \w strife|strong="H7379"\w* and \w debate|strong="H4683"\w*, and to \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* with the \w fist|strong="H0106"\w* of \w wickedness|strong="H7562"\w*: ye shall not \w fast|strong="H6684"\w* as \add ye do this\add* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, to make your \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* to be \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* on \w high|strong="H4791"\w*.\f + \fr 58.4 \ft ye shall…: or, ye fast not as this day\f*

Is it such a \w fast|strong="H6685"\w* that I have \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w*? a \w day|strong="H3117"\w* for a \w man|strong="H0120"\w* to \w afflict|strong="H6031"\w* his \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*? \add is it\add* to bow \w down|strong="H3721"\w* his \w head|strong="H7218"\w* as a \w bulrush|strong="H0100"\w*, and to \w spread|strong="H3331"\w* \w sackcloth|strong="H8242"\w* and \w ashes|strong="H0665"\w* \add under him\add*? wilt thou \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* a \w fast|strong="H6685"\w*, and an \w acceptable|strong="H7522"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* to the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*?\f + \fr 58.5 \ft a day…: or, to afflict his soul for a day?\f*

\add Is\add* not this the \w fast|strong="H6685"\w* that I have \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w*? to \w loose|strong="H6605"\w* the \w bands|strong="H2784"\w* of \w wickedness|strong="H7562"\w*, to \w undo|strong="H5425"\w* the \w heavy|strong="H4133"\w* \w burdens|strong="H0092"\w*, and to let the \w oppressed|strong="H7533"\w* \w go|strong="H7971"\w* \w free|strong="H2670"\w*, and that ye \w break|strong="H5423"\w* every \w yoke|strong="H4133"\w*?\f + \fr 58.6 \ft the heavy…: Heb. the bundles of the yoke\f*\f + \fr 58.6 \ft oppressed: Heb. broken\f*

\add Is it\add* not to \w deal|strong="H6536"\w* thy \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* to the \w hungry|strong="H7457"\w*, and that thou \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* the \w poor|strong="H6041"\w* that are cast \w out|strong="H4788"\w* to thy \w house|strong="H1004"\w*? when thou \w seest|strong="H7200"\w* the \w naked|strong="H6174"\w*, that thou \w cover|strong="H3680"\w* him; and that thou \w hide|strong="H5956"\w* not thyself from thine own \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*?\f + \fr 58.7 \ft cast…: or, afflicted\f*

¶ Then shall thy \w light|strong="H0216"\w* break \w forth|strong="H1234"\w* as the \w morning|strong="H7837"\w*, and thine \w health|strong="H0724"\w* shall spring \w forth|strong="H6779"\w* \w speedily|strong="H4120"\w*: and thy \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w* shall \w go|strong="H1980"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee; the \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall be thy \w rereward|strong="H0622"\w*.\f + \fr 58.8 \ft be…: Heb. gather thee up\f*

Then shalt thou \w call|strong="H7121"\w*, and the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall \w answer|strong="H6030"\w*; thou shalt \w cry|strong="H7768"\w*, and he shall \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, Here I \add am\add*. If thou take \w away|strong="H5493"\w* from the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of thee the \w yoke|strong="H4133"\w*, the putting \w forth|strong="H7971"\w* of the \w finger|strong="H0676"\w*, and \w speaking|strong="H1696"\w* \w vanity|strong="H0205"\w*;

And \add if\add* thou draw \w out|strong="H6329"\w* thy \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* to the \w hungry|strong="H7457"\w*, and \w satisfy|strong="H7646"\w* the \w afflicted|strong="H6031"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*; then shall thy \w light|strong="H0216"\w* \w rise|strong="H2224"\w* in \w obscurity|strong="H2822"\w*, and thy \w darkness|strong="H0653"\w* \add be\add* as the \w noonday|strong="H6672"\w*:

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall \w guide|strong="H5148"\w* thee \w continually|strong="H8548"\w*, and \w satisfy|strong="H7646"\w* thy \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* in \w drought|strong="H6710"\w*, and make \w fat|strong="H2502"\w* thy \w bones|strong="H6106"\w*: and thou shalt be like a \w watered|strong="H7302"\w* \w garden|strong="H1588"\w*, and like a \w spring|strong="H4161"\w* of \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, whose \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w fail|strong="H3576"\w* not.\f + \fr 58.11 \ft drought: Heb. droughts\f*\f + \fr 58.11 \ft fail: Heb. lie, or, deceive\f*

And \add they that shall be\add* of thee shall \w build|strong="H1129"\w* the \w old|strong="H5769"\w* waste \w places|strong="H2723"\w*: thou shalt raise \w up|strong="H6965"\w* the \w foundations|strong="H4146"\w* of \w many|strong="H1755"\w* \w generations|strong="H1755"\w*; and thou shalt be \w called|strong="H7121"\w*, The \w repairer|strong="H1443"\w* of the \w breach|strong="H6556"\w*, The \w restorer|strong="H7725"\w* of \w paths|strong="H5410"\w* to dwell \w in|strong="H3427"\w*.

¶ If thou turn \w away|strong="H7725"\w* thy \w foot|strong="H7272"\w* from the \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w*, \add from\add* \w doing|strong="H6213"\w* thy \w pleasure|strong="H2656"\w* on my \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*; and \w call|strong="H7121"\w* the \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* a \w delight|strong="H6027"\w*, the \w holy|strong="H6918"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w honourable|strong="H3513"\w*; and shalt \w honour|strong="H3513"\w* him, not \w doing|strong="H6213"\w* thine own \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, nor \w finding|strong="H4672"\w* thine own \w pleasure|strong="H2656"\w*, nor \w speaking|strong="H1696"\w* \add thine own\add* \w words|strong="H1697"\w*:

Then shalt thou \w delight|strong="H6026"\w* thyself in the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; and I will cause thee to \w ride|strong="H7392"\w* upon the high \w places|strong="H1116"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, and \w feed|strong="H0398"\w* thee with the \w heritage|strong="H5159"\w* of \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w*: for the \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \add it\add*.
